lang: English is only one wrapper. These worlds run natively in Gupapuy≈ãu and Gaelic.
drop: Synthed LoRAs crystallize into wearable form. Three limited edition on-chain artefacts. Isle of Skye tartan splices outback heat shimmer. Spectral blue glitch-print flight jacket threads Southern Cross asterism. Interwoven ruffle traces white ochre dot painting to territorial bounds.
